trait.name: Nimble Escape
text: The chaos-spawn goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The chaos-spawn goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Psychic Stab (Recharge 6)
text: The chaos-spawn goblin targets one creature that it can sense within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
